title: Describe power of test for patient disease

content.question: Which of the following best describes the power of the test?

choices.label: The probability that the new test is better than an older test to indicate whether a patient has the disease
The probability that the new test indicates the disease in a patient who has the disease
The probability that the new test indicates the disease in a patient who does not have the disease
The probability that the new test does not indicate the disease in a patient who has the disease
The probability that the new test does not indicate the disease in a patient who does not have the disease

content.answer: The probability that the new test indicates the disease in a patient who has the disease

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine relative frequencies, proportions, or probabilities using simulation or calculations.
